body_html:
The TensorFlow Python API should not change within a major version. Since we haven't released TF 2.0 yet, that means that all post-1.0 op-loading code should work.

We still haven't developed an official stable API for writing ops. However, in practice, this API has remained stable (at least AFAIK). Are you experiencing custom op instability between post-1.0 TF versions?

body:
The TensorFlow Python API should not change within a major version. Since we haven't released TF 2.0 yet, that means that all post-1.0 op-loading code should work.

We still haven't developed an official stable API for writing ops. However, in practice, this API has remained stable (at least AFAIK). Are you experiencing custom op instability between post-1.0 TF versions?
